name: wireguard-action
description: WireGuard VPN setup/teardown GitHub Action with automatic cleanup

scripts.build: npm run build:setup && npm run build:teardown
scripts.build:setup: ncc build src/setup.js -o dist/setup && cp setup.sh dist/setup/setup.sh
scripts.build:teardown: ncc build src/teardown.js -o dist/teardown && cp teardown.sh dist/teardown/teardown.sh
